speaker: Dina
text: In a small fishing village in the Philippines… that’s where I spent my whole life. Simple, quiet, and honestly… tiring. Ay nako… sometimes I wondered, how long can I live like this?

speaker: Dina
text: One day, exhaustion and desperation finally caught up with me. So I thought… maybe I need something faster. Something stronger. Something louder.

speaker: Dina
text: That was the day I became a dynamite fisher. And for a while… life actually felt easier. More fish, more money, more hope. I really thought I finally found my way out.
